instruction: How did US states get their names?
output:
The origin of many state's names is rooted in Native American languages, the language used by early European settlers or explorers, and historical events. Here are some examples:

1. Alabama - This name comes from a Choctaw word meaning "thicket-clearing."
2. Alaska- It was named after an Aleutian island called Akiak (meaning main land) by Russian fur traders.
3. Arizona – The Spanish word arizona means “fertile land.”
4. Arkansas - From an Algonquian Indian tribe that once lived there, Quapaws.
5. California - Named for Queen Calafia, a character in a popular book published by Garci Rodríguez de Montalvo around 1500 CE.

6. Colorado - Referring to its rich colors derived from Latin coloris which means ‘color’ 
7. Connecticut - It’s believed it came from the Mohegan Indians' word quinnehtukqut, meaning "long tidal river." 

8. Delaware - Named after Thomas West, Baron De La Warr, who served as colonial governor of Virginia during this time period. 

9. Florida - Derived from a Spanish term, Pascua florida, meaning 'feast of flowers'.
10. Georgia - In honor of King George II of England

11. Hawaii - Comes from the Polynesian words ha-wai-i, meaning 'homeland.'
12. Idaho - Coined from a Shoshone phrase eepah-mines, meaning'mountain stream.'

13. Illinois - Possibly derived from the Miami-Illinois word iliniwek, meaning'men.' 

14. Indiana - Taken from the Lenape (Delaware) word shawnong, meaning ‘the people.’

15. Iowa - Came from an Ioway native word Aiaghuxa, referring to them being the'sleepy ones,' because they were known for sleeping late into the morning hours.

16. Kansas - Translated from Kansa, the name of one of several Siouan tribes living there when Europeans arrived.

17. Kentucky - From an Iroquoian word kentake, meaning meadowland or prairie.

18. Louisiana - Honors French explorer Louis XIV.

19. Maine - Originally part of Massachusetts Bay Colony; later separated due to its northern location.

20. Maryland - Named in honor of Henrietta Maria, queen consort of Charles I of England.

21. Massachusetts - After the indigenous Massachusett, also spelled Massachuset.

instruction: Hi, my sister and her girlfriends want me to play kickball with them. Can you explain how the game is played, so they don't take advantage of me?
output:
Kickball is a fun and easy-to-play sport that combines elements from baseball and soccer. Here's an overview of how it works:

1) The game takes place on a field divided into two teams: pitchers and kickers.

2) Each team fields nine players at once (although smaller teams can still participate). 

3) A player from one team starts by pitching a ball like in softball or baseball while the opposing team’s designated kicker tries to hit it as far away as possible. If the pitcher catches the ball without it touching ground, their team gets another turn at bat.

4) When the batter kicks the ball successfully, he must try to run around four bases before being tagged out by the other team. If successful, this scores a point for his team.

5) After three outs are made (or when all members of the batting team have kicked), the roles reverse, and now the previous kicking team becomes the new pitching team.

6) Games usually last between five and seven innings, depending on agreed rules.

The basic idea behind playing kickball is similar to regular baseball but instead of using hands to throw or catch balls, you use your feet. It requires good hand-eye coordination, quick reflexes, teamwork, and strategy making it suitable for people of any age group.al videos online if needed! instruction: How do I wrap a present neatly?
output:
Here are the steps to wrap a gift nicely:

1. Choose your wrapping paper: Select a good quality, smooth textured and wrinkle-free wrapping paper.

2. Measure the box or item you want to cover: Take out measuring tape or ruler and measure the length and width of the object that needs covering.

3. Cut the wrapping paper: Lay down the wrapping sheet on an even surface with one end hanging over. Place the object in the center horizontally then make sure it is aligned vertically. Start cutting off excess edges from all sides leaving at least two inches of extra space around each side for folding.

4. Apply adhesive: Use double-sided tape along the bottom edge of the wrapping paper where you will fold it later.

5. Wrap up the present: Carefully pull the top part of the wrapping paper over the object, ensuring no wrinkles remain behind. Smooth any creases as they appear while doing this step.

6. Fold the corners: After aligning the topmost layer of the paper onto the base of the box, take care to tuck-in the overlapping parts into the interior of the package.

7. Secure with Tape: Make use of transparent tapes to secure the wrapped package together. This should be done only after smoothing out every wrinkle left behind by folding.

8. Decorate if desired: Add ribbons, bows, stickers, or other decorative items according to preference before giving away the beautifully-wrapped gift!al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.instructional videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents.al videos can also help in learning how to perfectly wrap presents

instruction: How do I dice without slicing my finger
output:
To dice food safely, follow these steps:

1. Start with a sharp knife: A dull or blunt knife can slip and cause injury while you're trying to cut your food into small pieces.

2. Hold the food firmly in place: Place the item on a cutting board, then use one hand to hold it steady as you work with the other hand to make cuts.

3. Use proper technique: Cut towards yourself instead of away from you so that if the blade slips, it's less likely to slice your fingers. Make short strokes rather than long ones for more control over where the knife is going.

4. Keep your fingertips out of harm’s way: Avoid placing them near the edge of the cutting board or holding onto the food too tightly at the edges.

5. Be patient: Take breaks between each cut to ensure safety. Don't rush through dicing because accidents are more prone to happen when we’re not fully focused.al video on how to properly dice vegetables like carrots, onions, bell peppers, and cucumbers using safe techniques. instruction: Hi, I'm trying to solve a crossword puzzle, but I've never done one of these before. Can you help me out?
output:
Sure! To start solving the crossword puzzle, first gather all necessary information about it such as its size (number of rows and columns), theme or subject matter, clues provided for each square, etc.

Next step is to analyze the given hints/ clues for each block and try to fill in the blanks with relevant words or phrases based on their meanings, context, length, patterns, anagrams, abbreviations or puns if any. Crossword puzzles usually have some squares already filled-in which can be used as starting points while filling up the remaining ones.

Also keep track of horizontal and vertical word chains that may intersect at certain blocks; they should make sense grammatically when connected together. Some advanced crosswords might also include diagonal or even spiral-word chains.

If stuck at any point, don't hesitate to take breaks or consult reference materials like dictionaries, encyclopedias, historical events or well-known people related to the crossword's theme for finding appropriate answers. Once completed satisfactorily, double-check your work by ensuring consistency within the grid, no repeats or misspellings.

instruction: What are different drawers I should have for clothes?
output:
Some suggested drawer categories for organizing your clothing could include:

1. Undergarments and Socks - Keep all of these items in one place, making it easy to find matching pairs or the right undergarment.

2. Shirts/Tops/Dresses- Organize by type (e.g., blouses vs t-shirts) then by color within each category.
 
3. Pants/Skirts/Jumpers- Again, organize by style first before arranging them according to color.

4. Active Wear/Workout Clothes- If you do a lot of exercising at home, this is where you can keep those comfortable leggings, sports bras, shorts etc

5. Outerwear- Coats, jackets, raincoats, vests, capes, ponchos etc can be kept here neatly folded or hung on hangers.

6. Accessories- Scarves, gloves, hats, belts, jewelry, ties, socks, handkerchiefs, hair accessories etc go well together so they deserve their own space.

7. Seasonal Clothing- In case you have seasonal wear such as winter coats, heavy sweaters, swimwear etc which you don't need during certain months, store them away until needed again..instructio

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Georgian  dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Kubdari?
output:
Kubdari is one of the most popular meat pies in Georgia, made with lamb or beef mixed with spices and herbs such as coriander, black pepper, garlic, basil, marjoram, and parsley. The dough used is similar to pizza crust but with added egg yolks.

Ingredients:
-500 grams ground lamb (or beef)
-2 cloves minced garlic 
-1 teaspoon dried basil leaves 
-1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley 
-1 tablespoon finely grated lemon zest 
-3 tablespoons all-purpose flour 
-1 large egg yolk
-salt and freshly ground black pepper

For Dough:

-350g flour 
-20 ml olive oil 
-10ml water 
-7 g yeast 
-0.5 tsp salt 

Instructions:  
Firstly prepare the filling by mixing together ground lamb, minced garlic, dried basil leaves, chopped fresh parsley, lemon zest, flour, salt and pepper until well combined.
In another bowl mix flour, yeast, olive oil, water and salt then knead it till smooth.
Roll out half of the dough on a floured surface into an approximately 30x40 cm rectangle shape.
Place the filling mixture onto the center third of the rolled-out dough leaving about two inches around edges.
Moisten edge of the rectangle with little bit of water.
Fold over top and bottom thirds of the dough over the filling, pinching seam closed along sides.
Using a sharp knife cut off excess dough from ends.
Brush the remaining beaten egg yolk over the top of the kubdari.
Bake in preheated oven at 200 degrees Celsius for about 45 minutes, until golden brown.
Let cool before slicing and serving.
Enjoy!instructio

instruction: I'm trying to teach myself to have nicer handwriting. Can you help?
output:
Sure, I'd be happy to assist! Here are a few tips that might help improve your handwriting:

1) Practice regularly: Try writing letters or words repeatedly until they become more legible and consistent.

2) Use the right tools: Invest in good quality pens with smooth ink flow, and try different paper types such as lined or graph paper to find what works best for you.

3) Keep it steady: Hold your pen at a comfortable angle while maintaining an even pressure on the page.

4) Focus on alignment: Make sure each letter is aligned correctly within its space, and keep lines straight when writing paragraphs.

5) Slow down: Take time to write carefully instead of rushing through sentences.

6) Relax: Tension can cause shaky hands so take deep breaths, relax your shoulders, and concentrate on forming neat characters one by one.

With regular practice, these techniques should make your handwriting neater over time.al texts.al texts.al texts.instructional texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al text

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Somali  dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Canjeero?
output:
Sure! Canjeero is also known as canjeer or lahoh, it's a popular dish in Somalia that resembles pancakes but thicker with a slightly sour taste.

Ingredients:
-1 cup all-purpose flour 
-½ tsp baking powder 
-¼ tsp salt 
-2 cups water 
-2 tbsp vegetable oil

Instructions:

1. Mix the flour, baking powder, and salt together.
2. Gradually add enough water into the mixture until it forms a smooth batter (about one-and-a-half cups).
3. Heat an ungreased frying pan over medium heat then pour about two tablespoons of batter onto the center of the hot skillet.
4. Spread the batter evenly using your spatula; let cook undisturbed for approximately one minute before flipping to another side.
5. Cook both sides till they are golden brown.
6. Serve immediately, topped with butter, honey, syrup, sugar or any other sweetener of choice.

Enjoy this delicious breakfast/ lunch option with friends or family.:instructio

instruction: What are the best exercises for beginners?
output:
Some of the best exercises for beginner include:

1. Squats: This is a great exercise to strengthen your legs and glutes.

2. Push-ups: These work on building chest, shoulder, and arm muscles.

3. Lunges: Helps build leg strength while also working out core stability.

4. Planks: They target multiple muscle groups including abdominal muscles, obliques, lower back, arms, shoulders, etc.

5. Jumping rope: A fun way to increase cardiovascular endurance and coordination.

6. Walking or jogging: Excellent form of low-impact cardio that can improve overall fitness levels quickly.

7. Dumbbell rows: Works on strengthening upper body by targeting lats, biceps, tricep muscles

8. Tricep dips - works on developing strong upper body with minimal equipment requirement

instruction: Do you know why turkeys became the official food of thanksgiving?
output:
The tradition of eating turkey at Thanksgiving dates back to President Abraham Lincoln, who declared it a national holiday in 1863. At that time, wild turkey was an abundant game bird and was considered as a traditional meal for celebrations and harvest festivals by many Native American tribes.

Over time, roasted turkey has become synonymous with Thanksgiving feasts across America because it is large enough to serve a crowd, easy to prepare, and its mild flavor pairs well with various side dishes such as stuffing or gravy..instructio

instruction: I want to get better at networking at work
output:
Here are some tips and strategies that you can implement in order to improve your networking skills within the workplace:

1. Attend company events: Participate actively in any internal event or gathering organized by your organization, such as meetings, conferences, workshops, seminars, etc., where there is an opportunity for interaction with colleagues.

2. Join professional groups: Find out if your office has a group of professionals dedicated to specific tasks or projects, join them and contribute actively.

3. Build relationships with coworkers: Take time every day to interact informally with co-workers; share experiences about common interests like sports, movies or music.

4. Get involved in team building activities: Look into joining teams responsible for organizing recreational activities (such as outings) which will give you more opportunities to socialize and network.

5. Volunteer for committees: Offer yourself voluntarily when new committees are formed, participate in their discussions, offer ideas and take part in decision-making processes.

6. Be proactive on digital platforms: Use corporate communication tools such as instant messaging, email or video conferencing to communicate with others outside your department, ask questions and provide answers whenever necessary.

7. Keep track of contacts: Maintain contact information of people you meet through various channels - this way it’s easier to follow up later.

8. Make a good first impression: Always be well groomed, dress professionally, maintain eye-contact while speaking and smile frequently during interactions.

9. Follow-up after meetings: Send thank-you notes, emails or messages to those who have helped you, appreciated your efforts or provided valuable input.

10. Ask for feedback: Don't hesitate to seek constructive criticism from superiors or peers regarding how you handle interpersonal situations. This helps identify areas of improvement and allows you to adjust accordingly.

By implementing these steps consistently over time, you'll find that your ability to build strong business connections improves significantly.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.instructional technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology

instruction: Are there any weird Christmas traditions?
output:
Yes, many countries and cultures have their own unique Christmas traditions that may seem strange to others. Some of these include:

1. In the Philippines, people often throw open windows on Christmas Eve in hopes that good luck will enter their homes.

2. In Norway, it is customary for young men to dress up as Santa Claus and go from house to house caroling, while receiving treats in return.

3. In Spain, families leave their shoes by the fireplace or front door on Christmas Eve hoping that the Three Wise Men would fill them with gifts.

4. In some parts of Germany, a straw man called "Striezelmann" is burned outside each year to symbolize the burning away of bad things before Christmas.

5. In Colombia, children put out bags filled with grasses instead of stockings so that Baby Jesus can use them as bedding during his visit.

6. In Finland, they eat rice pudding topped with whipped cream and cinnamon on Christmas Day which resembles snow.

7. The Czech Republic has an unusual tradition where unmarried women are supposed to place a pair of old, unwashed underwear under their tree on Christmas Eve. If this happens, they'll supposedly receive a marriage proposal within the next twelve months.

8. In Greece, households light a small candle every night leading up to Christmas Day. On December 24th, all candles are blown out together and lit again after midnight mass. This represents Christ's birth.

These are just a few examples of how different communities celebrate Christmas around the world. Each one adds its uniqueness to the festivities making the season more exciting and interesting.al design course onlin

instruction: Hi, I'm interested in learning to play badminton. Can you explain the game to me?
output:
Badminton is a fun and exciting sport that can be played by people of all ages. It's played on an oval-shaped court with high nets at both ends. The objective of the game is for each player or team to hit a small lightweight shuttlecock back and forth across the net using racquets until one side either misses their shot or fails to return it.

The game starts when two players or teams stand on opposite sides of the center line before serving begins. One player serves first while standing in his half of the court; then after the serve has been returned successfully, they switch positions and take turns hitting the shuttlecock back and forth over the net.

There are several types of shots used in Badminton including: drive (hit straight down), clear (high lobbed shot), drop (softly dropped under control) among others. Strategy also plays an important role as different strokes require varying levels of skill and power from the player.

A match consists of three games, which must typically be won by two points. Games go up to 21 points but if scores reach 20-19 the game continues till someone reaches two point lead. A rally is considered ended once the shuttlecock hits the floor, goes out of bounds or bounces more than once off the surface.

instruction: Do you know why cats always rub up against your legs?
output: Cats have a natural instinct to mark their territory by rubbing against objects or people. When they rub against our legs, it is a way for them to leave behind pheromones that help identify themselves and also claim us as part of their "territory." instruction: I am going to try to roast a pig at home for Thanksgiving this year. What equipment and techniques do I need to successfully get a pig roasted?
output:
Roasting a whole pig can be quite an undertaking, but it is possible with the right preparation and tools. Here are some steps you may find helpful:

1. Choose your Pig: Look for a young hog that weighs between 80-120 pounds. The younger the animal, the more tender its meat will be.

2. Prepare Your Equipment: You’ll need a large roaster or BBQ pit that’s big enough to fit the entire pig. A spit rotisserie works great too! Also make sure you have long-handled tongs, sharp knives, and heavy-duty gloves handy.
 
3. Trussing: Once your pig has been cleaned and gutted (ask your butcher to help if needed), tie its legs together securely using twine or wire. This helps keep the body in shape while cooking.

4. Seasoning: Rub spices such as salt, pepper, garlic powder, rosemary, thyme, sage onto the skin of the pig before placing him on the rack inside the oven or grill. 

5. Cooking Time: Cook until internal temperature reaches about 160 degrees Fahrenheit, which takes around two hours per pound when roasted in an oven preheated to approximately 375°F. Use a thermometer inserted into the thigh muscle without touching bone to check doneness. If you’re using a smoker, cook until the internal temp hits 180F.


6. Rest Before Serving: After removing from heat, let the pork rest for 20 minutes prior to carving so juices redistribute throughout the meat.

7. Carving: Slice off portions by cutting down along both sides of backbone, then remove any remaining bones or ribs.

Enjoy your deliciously roasted pig at your next gathering!al videos online can also give you tips on how to properly truss, season, and carve your pig for optimal results. instruction: What type of soil is suitable for cactus?
output: Cacti thrive in well-draining, sandy or gravelly soils that are low in nutrients. These types of soils mimic the natural environment these plants grow in which usually have minimal water retention and few organic materials present. Soil with a pH between 6 to 7.5 also works best for most species. It’s important not to use heavy clay-based soils as they retain moisture leading to root rot. instruction: How do you become an author?
output:
Becoming a successful and published author involves several steps, including:

1. Develop your writing skills: Start by practicing your craft through regular writing sessions and reading books on the art of storytelling.

2. Identify your niche or genre: Decide what kind of book you want to write – fiction, non-fiction, memoirs etc., and research popular genres within that category.

3. Plan out your story: Create an outline for your novel or work on a detailed plot before starting to write.

4. Write consistently: Dedicate time each day to focus solely on writing until your manuscript is complete.

5. Get feedback from others: Join writers' groups or find beta readers who can offer constructive criticism and help improve your work.

6. Find a literary agent: Research agents in your chosen field and send them queries about representing your book. A good agent will be able to help guide you towards publication.

7. Polish up your manuscript: Once you have found representation with a reputable agency, they'll assist you in editing and revising your work so it's ready for submission.

8. Publish your book: After going through rounds of revisions, submit your final version to publishers, either traditionally or independently if self-publishing.

Remember, becoming an author takes patience, dedication, hard-work, and perseverance but the end result - seeing your words come alive in print- makes all the effort worth it!a

instruction: What are some species of bears that are now extinct?
output:
Some species of bears that have gone extinct in the past include: 
1. Steller's Sea Bear (Ursus maritimus emmonsi or Ursus euryapsis) - Also known as the Alaskan coastal brown bear, it was hunted to extinction for its fur and oil reserves.
2. Irish Brown Bear (Ursus arctos pyrenaicus)- It is believed to be driven into extinction due to overhunting by humans around 800 years ago.
3. Crete Dwarf Bear (Arctotherium cretense) – This prehistoric dwarf species lived on the island of Crete during the Pleistocene epoch about 70,000-10000 BC before becoming extinct.
4. North American Giant Short-faced Bear (Aralarctos simus)– also called "the giant short faced bear," this species went extinct between 12,000 and 9,500 years ago.

These are just a few examples of several other species of bears which became extinct due to various reasons including climate change, habitat destruction, hunting etc.al.al.al.instructional.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.al.a

instruction: What causes the northern lights?
output:
The Northern Lights, also known as Aurora Borealis, are caused by collisions between particles from the sun and gases in Earth's upper atmosphere. These particles become electrically charged when they reach our planet’s magnetic field, which then accelerates them towards the north pole where they collide with oxygen molecules high up in the sky, causing them to emit green light that we see as a glowing curtain on clear nights.

This phenomenon occurs mainly at higher latitudes near the North Pole because of Earth's tilted axis; it is less common further south due to fewer atmospheric gases present for these particle instruction: What are some good foods to eat when you are sick? I am looking for something to make my girlfriend to eat.
output:
When you're feeling under the weather, it's important to get enough nutrients and hydration. Some good options include:
- Clear broth-based soups or chicken noodle soup (which has been shown in studies to help reduce symptoms of upper respiratory tract infections)
- Broth-based clear vegetable or fruit juices 
- Applesauce or other soft fruits like bananas, peaches, or pears
- Yogurt with active cultures can be soothing on an upset stomach.
- Bananas which contain potassium that may prevent muscle cramps from dehydration
- Rice is a simple carbohydrate easy to digest while providing energy.
- Plain toast or crackers if your stomach allows them as they provide much-needed carbohydrates and calories.
- Ginger tea helps soothe nausea and reduces inflammation.
- Chicken or turkey breast meat, tuna fish, salmon, shrimp or lean beef without added sauces or spices since protein is needed to heal wounds and repair tissue damage.
Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of fluids such as water, herbal teas or broth. If you have vomiting or diarrhea, drink electrolyte replacement drinks or sports beverages. Avoid dairy products, caffeine, alcohol, spicy food or highly seasoned dishes, fatty or fried foods, citrus juice or acidic fruits until you feel better.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.instructional texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts.al texts

instruction: Why is kobe beef so damn expensive?
output:
Kobe Beef, also known as Wagyu beef from Japan or Black Angus cattle in the US, is considered one of the most premium types of meat. It's named after Kobe City, where it was originally raised and developed into its high-quality taste.

The reason for why this type of beef can be quite pricey lies within several factors:

1) Limited Supply: Only a small number of cows are bred to produce such tender and flavorful meat. Because they have been selectively chosen due to their genetic characteristics and fed on special diets, there’s simply not enough supply to meet demand.
 
2) High Standards: To qualify as true "Kobe" beef, the animals must meet strict standards that include being massaged regularly with sake, having access to beer baths and receiving top-notch care throughout their lives. These practices ensure that only the highest quality cuts make it onto store shelves and restaurant menus at an exorbitant price point.

3) Labor Intensive Process: The process behind producing Kobe beef requires extensive labor and attention to detail. From feeding them specially formulated grains and milk to giving massages every day, all these activities contribute towards making Kobe beef more expensive than other varieties of beef available out there.

4) Demand Outweighs Supply: With increasing popularity among food connoisseurs worldwide, the demand for Kobe beef has skyrocketed over time. Since supplies remain limited even today, prices continue to rise accordingly.

In summary, Kobe beef comes with a hefty price tag because it involves raising livestock according to specific guidelines, which leads to less availability compared to traditional breeds of cattle.al videos, games, quizzes, etc.al videos, games, quizzes, etc.al videos, games, quizzes, etc.instructional videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos, games, quizzes, etal videos

instruction: How do I clean my armpits?
output:
To effectively clean your underarms, you can follow these steps:

1. Start by washing the area with warm water and mild soap to remove any dirt or sweat.

2. Use an antiperspirant or deodorant after drying off completely to prevent body odor from building up again quickly.

3. If you have particularly sweaty or smelly areas, consider using a natural scrub made of baking soda, coconut oil, and sugar to exfoliate dead skin cells that could be contributing to odors.

4. Be sure to dry thoroughly afterward to avoid irritation or rashes.

5. Finally, make sure to change out of wet clothes immediately when they become damp as this will help reduce bacteria growth in the area.

instruction: How do I detail a car?
output:
To detail a car, you can follow these steps:

1. Wash the exterior: Start by washing your car to remove dirt and grime from its surface. You may use soap or shampoo specifically made for cars.

2. Clean the wheels: Next, clean the tires and rims of your vehicle. This will help prevent brake dust and other particles from accumulating on them over time.

3. Dry the bodywork: After washing your car, dry it thoroughly using soft towels or chamois leather. Make sure that no water droplets remain on the paintwork as they could cause rusting if left unattended.

4. Polish the paint job: Once your car is completely dry, apply polishing compound onto a microfiber cloth and gently rub it into the clear coat. This step helps bring back shine and removes small scratches or swirl marks in the finish.

5. Wax the body: Apply wax after polishing the paintjob. A good quality automotive polish protects the paint against environmental elements like UV rays while also making the finish glossy.

6. Vacuum the interior: Begin cleaning inside the car with vacuuming all carpets, mats, floorboards, and upholstery. Pay special attention to areas around the pedals, under seats, and between cushions where dirt tends to accumulate.

7. Detail the dashboard: Use glass cleaner to wipe down the dash, console, steering wheel, gearshift knob, air vents, and any other plastic surfaces within reach. For stubborn stains, use an appropriate stain remover according to instructions on packaging.

8. Clean windows: Finally, wash all windows, both inside and out. Avoid streaks by using lint-free cloths or paper towels instead of newspaper which contains ink that can transfer onto the windowpane.

By following these simple steps regularly, you'll keep your car looking brand new!al text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.al text begins here.instructional text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.al text begins here.al text ends here.a

instruction: I am going to make pumpkin pie for the first time.  Can you help me?
output:
Sure! Here are some tips and instructions that might be helpful:

1. Choose a ripe, sweet-tasting sugar pumpkin or pre-cooked canned pureed pumpkin as your base.

2. Prepare the crust: You can either buy an unbaked store-bought pie shell or bake one from scratch using flour, butter, salt, and water.
 
3. Mix together pumpkin purée with eggs, heavy cream, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground nutmeg, and ground cloves in a bowl until well combined.

4. Pour the mixture into the prepared pie crust.

5. Bake at 425°F (218°C) for 15 minutes, then reduce heat to 350°F (177°C), and continue baking for another 40-50 minutes.

6. Allow it to cool completely before serving. 

7. Serve it chilled, topped with whipped cream, if desired.

Enjoy your homemade pumpkin pie!.instructio

instruction: What kind of foods do they eat in Thailand
output:
In Thailand, the cuisine is a blend of different flavors and ingredients. The staple food for most Thais are rice and noodles with an array of side dishes which includes curries, soups, stir-fried vegetables or meat, salads etc.

Some popular Thai dishes include Pad Thai (stir fried rice noodles), Tom Yum soup, Green Curry (curry made from green chili peppers), Som Tam (spicy papaya salad) Khao Man Gai (chicken and jasmine rice dish) among others.

Thailand also has a wide variety of street foods including grilled meats, satays, sticky rice served with mangoes, coconut desserts, and many more.

Seafood is widely available as well since it's surrounded by water on three sides, so you can find fresh fish like Pla Salmon, shrimp, crab, lobster etc being used in various preparations.

Overall, Thai cuisine is known to be spicy, flavorful and fragrant with a mix of hot chilies, lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, galangal, coriander root, garlic, ginger, basil along with herbs, spices and tropical fruits making their way into the cooking process..instructio

instruction: What is Atlantis?
output: Atlantis was a legendary city or island, first mentioned in the writings of Plato. According to his account, it was an advanced civilization located beyond the Pillars of Hercules (now known as the Strait of Gibraltar) that sank into the ocean due to natural disasters and hubris. Many people believe that this story could have been based on real events but there's no evidence to support its existence. The idea has captured popular imagination over time with many theories about where it may have been located and what happened to it being proposed by historians, archaeologists, and conspiracy theorists alike.: What are your thoughts?instructio

instruction: How do I make escargot?
output:
Escargots are delicious, savory bites of snails that can be enjoyed as an appetizer. Here's a simple recipe to make them at home:

Ingredients:
- 1 pound fresh or frozen snails (you could also use canned)
- Salt and pepper 
- Garlic cloves, minced
- Butter
- Herbs de Provence (or any dried herb blend you prefer) 
- Sherry wine (optional)
- Parmesan cheese 

Instructions: 
1. Start by cleaning the snail shells - rinse under running water and let dry.
2. Heat some butter in a large skillet over medium heat; add garlic and cook until fragrant but not browned, about two minutes.
3. Add salt and pepper to taste then increase heat to high and stir occasionally for around three more minutes until lightly golden.
4. Remove from heat, pour in sherry if using it, and return pan to stove top on low heat.
5. Preheat oven to broil while adding snails into the skillet, cooking for ten minutes with occasional stirring.
6. Spoon cooked mixture generously into each cleaned shell before topping off with grated parmesan cheese.
7. Place filled shells onto baking sheet lined with parchment paper, place inside preheated oven and allow broiling for five minutes till bubbly hot.

Enjoy your freshly made Escargot!al video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tZyQoTqDmYinstructional video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tZyQoTqDmYal video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tZyQoTqDmYal video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tZyQoTqDmYal video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tZyQoTqDmYal video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tZyQoTqDmYal video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tZyQoTqDmYal video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tZyQoTqDmYal video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tZyQoTqDmYal video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9tZyQoTqD

instruction: What exactly causes volcanoes to form?
output:
Volcanic activity is caused by the movement of tectonic plates, which are large segments of Earth's crust that move slowly over time. When two or more of these plates come into contact with each other and begin moving in opposite directions, it can cause pressure to build up beneath the surface.

The movement creates a crack in the earth’s crust called a rift zone where molten rock (magma) collects. If this magma reaches the earth's surface, it will erupt as lava through an opening known as a volcano.

In addition, some volcanic activities have been linked to subduction zones, where one plate moves under another causing a great deal of heat buildup within the mantle. This leads to melting rocks that eventually find their way to the surface creating new landmasses such as islands.

Overall, volcanism occurs when there is enough thermal energy stored in the uppermost part of our planet’s interior that drives convection currents deep below us. These rising columns of hot material then push against the solid roof above them until they either break out onto the surface or find alternative routes for release like earthquakes.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.instructional technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technology expert at edX.al technolog

instruction: Hi, I have some falafel, but no tahini to put on them. Can you give me a recipe for making tahini?
output:
Sure! Tahini is made from sesame seeds that are toasted and ground into a paste. Here's an easy recipe:

Ingredients:
- 1 cup raw hulled or unhulled sesame seeds 
- 2 tablespoons olive oil (optional)
- Salt

Instructions: 

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F.
2. Spread the sesame seeds in a single layer on a baking sheet.
3. Toast the seeds in the oven until they turn golden brown and become fragrant, about 10 minutes. Make sure not to burn them!
4. Let cool completely.
5. Put the cooled sesame seeds into a food processor or blender, along with any optional ingredients such as salt or oil.
6. Process until smooth and creamy, scraping down the sides of the bowl if needed. You may need to stop occasionally to scrape off any chunks stuck around the edges. The texture should be like nut butter.

instruction: When was Canada colonized?
output:
Canada wasn't "colonized" in the traditional sense, as it was never a colony of any other country. Instead, what happened is that European countries (mainly Britain) established settlements and trading posts along the eastern coast during the 17th century. These early colonies were largely focused on trade with Indigenous peoples for furs, which led to an influx of Europeans into the area.

Over time, these British North American colonies grew and expanded westward through treaties and purchases from various First Nations groups. In 1867, the British North America Act created the Dominion of Canada, uniting several provinces under one government..instructio

instruction: How can I  use my phone less?
output:
Here are some tips that might help you reduce your screen time on your smartphone:

1. Set limits: Decide how much time per day or week is reasonable for you to spend using your phone, and stick to it.

2. Find alternative activities: Instead of reaching for your phone when you're bored or looking for entertainment, try finding other hobbies such as reading a book, practicing an instrument, going outside for exercise, etc.

3. Use the "do not disturb" feature: This will prevent notifications from popping up and interrupting what you’re doing.

4. Keep track of usage with apps: There are many apps available which allow users to monitor their device usage and set goals for reducing screen-time.

5. Put away distractions: If possible, keep your phone out of sight while working or studying so that you don't feel tempted to check social media or email.

6. Take breaks: Every hour or two, take a break from your phone by turning off data connectivity, putting it in another room, or simply setting it aside until later.

7. Practice mindfulness: Be mindful about why you pick up your phone, whether it's because you have nothing else to do or if there’s something important happening that needs attention right now.

Remember, spending too much time on technology has been associated with negative health effects like anxiety, depression, sleep disturbances and more. So make sure you strike a balance between staying connected and enjoying real-life experiences...instruction............................................................................................................

instruction: How did mankind discover that the earth was spherical, and why did they initially believe it to be flat?
output:
The idea of a round Earth dates back at least as far as ancient Greece. The first recorded evidence of this belief comes from Anaxagoras (c. 500 BC), who argued that the Earth had to be spherical in order for eclipses of the Sun by the Moon to occur.

However, the most famous proponent of the spherical shape of our planet is probably Pythagoras around 540 B.C., followed later on by Aristotle about 330 years before Christ. It's also worth noting that other cultures such as China or India came up with similar conclusions independently around the same time period.

In contrast, many people believed in an earthly model called "flat Earth" until much later. This view persisted because sailing westward would eventually return you to your starting point if the world were indeed circular; however, since no one could circumnavigate the globe yet, there was little empirical proof available to disprove its validity.

It wasn't until the Age of Exploration, when sailors like Christopher Columbus set out to find new trade routes across the ocean, that the reality of a spherical Earth became widely accepted. By observing how the sun and stars rose and set differently depending upon location, these explorers gathered enough data to prove beyond doubt what we now know today: Our home planet is indeed round!al video on this topic.al video on this topic.instructional video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic.al video on this topic

instruction: Why did humans evolve to believe in God?
output:
There are several theories about why humans have evolved a tendency towards religious belief. One possible explanation is that our ancestors who believed in supernatural beings were more likely to survive and reproduce because they perceived the world as less threatening, felt greater social cohesion within their group, and acted with higher levels of cooperation than those without such beliefs.

Another theory suggests that religion may serve an adaptive function by providing individuals with a sense of purpose or meaning, which can enhance well-being and promote prosocial behavior. Believing in a divine being could also motivate people to act morally and cooperate for mutual benefit, leading to increased survival rates among groups with strong religious convictions.

Ultimately, it's important to note that these explanations do not prove that religious belief is inherently true; rather, they provide potential evolutionary reasons behind its prevalence across human cultures.al.

output:
There are several materials you could use to construct the walls, roof and floor of your cabin. Some popular options include wood (such as cedar or Douglas fir), brick, stone, concrete blocks, metal studs or panels, and even straw bales.

instruction: Why do a lot of Scientists not believe in God or Satan?
output:
There are many reasons why scientists may choose to be non-believers. Some argue that science and religion have different approaches towards understanding the world, with science relying on empirical evidence while religion relies on faith and belief systems. Others point out that scientific theories like evolution seem to contradict religious teachings about creationism.

Additionally, some scientists see no need for a deity as they find sufficient explanations within natural phenomena, without resorting to supernatural entities. Many also feel it is their duty to critically examine all claims made by others, including those based on personal beliefs, which can lead them to question the validity of religious concepts.

Furthermore, there's an increasing body of research showing that belief in God doesn't necessarily make people more moral or kind than atheists, so this argument often used against atheistic thinking has been weakened over time. Ultimately, everyone is entitled to their own opinions and beliefs, but one thing remains certain: Science and Religion both offer valuable perspectives into our existence.......instruction.........................................................................................................................................................

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Mauritian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Mine Frite?
output:
Sure! A popular dish that is often served as an appetizer or snack in Mauritius is mine frites - deep fried slices of potato coated with spicy batter.

Ingredients:
- Potatoes (about 1 kg)
- Salt
- Pepper
- Garlic powder
- Onion powder
- Paprika 
- Flour
- Baking Powder
- Egg
- Oil

Instructions:

1. Peel the potatoes and cut them into thin round slices.
2. In a bowl, mix salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder and paprika together.
3. Place flour in another separate bowl.
4. Beat egg lightly in yet another bowl.
5. Heat oil in a frying pan until it reaches about 170 degrees Celsius on medium heat.
6. Coat each slice of potato first in flour then dip them in beaten eggs before finally rolling them over seasoned mixture.
7. Once ready, carefully slide coated potato slices one by one gently into hot oil.
8. Fry mine frites till they turn golden brown and crispy, turning occasionally so that both sides are evenly cooked.
9. Drain excess oil using paper towel once done cooking.
10. Serve your freshly made mine frites alongside ketchup while still warm!

Enjoy this delicious snack straight out of Mauritius!::instructio

instruction: Why can I see the moon during the day?
output: You can see the Moon during the daytime because it is not a bright source of light itself, but rather reflects sunlight. The amount of reflected light that reaches Earth depends on where the Sun illuminates the surface of the Moon at any given time. When the Sun and the Moon are in opposition (180 degrees apart), the side facing us appears dark because no direct rays from the sun fall upon its night-side. However, when the Sun rises over one hemisphere while setting down another or if there’s a new moon phase then we get to witness this phenomenon as more than half of our natural satellite becomes illuminated by the sun which makes it visible even during daylight hours!al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.instructional videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos.al videos

instruction: How do I take care of a wooden table?
output:
To keep your wooden table in good condition, you can follow these steps:

1. Dust the surface regularly: Use a soft cloth to dust and wipe down the wood every day or at least once per week.

2. Clean with mild soap: Occasionally use a dampened microfiber cloth dipped into soapy water (use dishwashing liquid) to clean stains from the tabletop.
 
3. Avoid using abrasive cleaners: Never use any harsh chemicals or abrasives on the wood as it may damage its finish.

4. Protect against moisture: Keep food and drinks away from the edges of the table; spills should be wiped up immediately to prevent warping or swelling of the wood due to excess moisture.

5. Prevent scratches: Place coasters under glasses or cups when sitting them on the table, especially if they have sharp bottoms that might scratch the surface.

6. Polish occasionally: Apply a thin coat of furniture polish to protect the wood's natural shine and luster. Let dry completely before wiping off any excess.

7. Refinish periodically: If the topcoat is damaged or worn out, sanding and refinishing are necessary for restoring the beauty and durability of the table.al video about how to refinish a wooden table here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0jNzKQfVJkE

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Danish dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Flæskesteg?
output:
Flæskesteg is a traditional roast pork dish popular in Denmark. Here's the classic recipe:

Ingredients:
- A whole boneless pork loin (about 5 pounds)
- Salt 
- Pepper 

For the glaze: 
- Apple cider vinegar
- Honey or sugar

Instructions:  
1. Preheat your oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Rub salt all over the pork, inside and out.
3. Place the meat on a roasting rack set into a large baking sheet. Roast it uncovered for about an hour until browned.
4. Reduce heat to 325F, baste with apple juice and continue cooking until internal temperature reaches around 150 F, this will take approximately another one-and-a-half hours.
5. Baste occasionally during the second half-hour of cooking.
6. After removing from the oven let rest for ten minutes before carving.

Enjoy your delicious flæskesteg!instructio

instruction: Please tell me about the romantic relationship between Julius Caesar and Cleopatra.
output:
Julius Caesar and Cleopatra had a tumultuous yet passionate love affair that changed history. They first met in Egypt when he was on his way to conquer Gaul, and she was seeking military aid from him against her brother who wanted to take over the throne of Egypt. Their initial meeting is said to have been at a banquet where they were both intoxicated by each other’s charm and beauty. 

Their relationship grew stronger as time passed; Caesar fell deeply for Cleopatra's intelligence, wit, charm and determination while she saw Caesar as someone powerful enough to help her regain control of Egypt. It has also been suggested that their attraction may have stemmed partly because they came from similar backgrounds - both being members of ruling families with ambitious goals. The two spent much time together during which Caesar helped restore order in Egypt after its civil war, and Cleopatra bore him a son named Ptolemy XIV (later renamed Caesarion).

However, all good things come to an end eventually. When Caesar returned to Rome, Cleopatra followed him there hoping to convince him not to leave without her or their child. But this did not go down well with the Romans and it led to public outrage. In fact, some historians believe that one reason why Caesar was assassinated later was due to jealousy aroused among Roman politicians towards the close bond shared by these two leaders. After Caesar died, Cleopatra tried to form alliances with different factions but ultimately failed. She committed suicide using poisonous snakes, thus ending what could be considered one of the most famous romances of all times..instructio

instruction: Hi, I'm in the mood for a Bloody Mary. Can you give me a recipe for making one?
output:
Sure! A classic Bloody Mary is made with vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, hot sauce, Worcestershire sauce and some spices like pepper or celery salt.

Here's an easy recipe to make:

Ingredients:
- 2 oz Vodka 
- 6 oz Tomato Juice
- 1 tsp Lemon Juice
- 1/4 tsp Hot Sauce (or more if desired)
- Salt & Pepper to taste

Instructions: 

Fill a shaker with ice.
Pour all ingredients into the shaker except for tomato juice.
Shake well until chilled.
Add tomato juice slowly while stirring gently.
Serve over ice in a glass rimmed with your favorite seasoning blend - such as celery salt, black pepper or old bay seasoning.

Enjoy

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Ukrainian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Okroshka?
output:
Sure! One popular dish that originated from Ukraine is called "Okroshka" which is basically a cold soup made with boiled vegetables such as potatoes, carrots or beets, dill weed, eggs, and kvas (a fermented beverage) mixed together.

Here's an easy-to-follow recipe:

Ingredients:
-2 large cucumbers 
-4 medium size potatoes 
-1 carrot 
-3 hard-boiled eggs 
-dried dill weed 
-kvas 

Instructions: 
1. Start by boiling the potatoes until they are soft.
2. In another pot boil the carrots till tender.
3. Cut the cucumber into small cubes after removing their seeds.
4. Boil the eggs, peel them off then cut them into halves.
5. Once all ingredients have been cooked properly drain the water out leaving only about one cup of potato juice.
6. Mix everything together including the dried dill weed and add your KVAS slowly while stirring continuously.
7. Chill it down before serving.
8. You can serve this chilled okroshka on its own or garnish it with fresh herbs, chopped onions, parsley leaves, and sour cream if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Ukrainian dish!:instruction:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Danish dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Koldskål?
output:
Koldskål is a traditional Scandinavian cold soup that's perfect for hot summer days! Here’s an easy-to-make recipe:

Ingredients:
-1 liter (4 cups) milk
-2 tablespoons sugar 
-3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract or vaniljesukker
-the zest of one lemon
-a pinch of salt

Instructions: 

1. In a large pot over medium heat, mix together the milk, sugar, vanilla, lemon zest, and salt.

2. Stir occasionally until it reaches boiling point then lower the temperature to simmer gently for about ten minutes.

3. Remove from heat once done cooking, let cool down completely before serving chilled with your favorite fruits such as strawberries, blueberries or raspberries on top. Enjoy!

Note: You can also add a few drops of vinegar while heating up the mixture; this adds a tangy flavor but isn't essential.al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8instructional video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gZfHxLQcT8al video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v

instruction: Please tell me the history of Walt Disney.
output:
Walt Disney was born on December 5, 1901 in Chicago Illinois. He had an older brother named Herbert and a younger sister Ruth. His father Elias was a businessman who sold hardware supplies while his mother Flora worked as a teacher. When he was four years old, his family moved to Marceline Missouri where they ran a successful dairy farm until their return back to Chicago when Walt turned seven years old.

At school, Walt showed great interest in drawing which eventually led him to enroll at the Academy of Fine Arts in Kansas City, however, his parents could not afford this so instead, he attended night classes there for two years before leaving without graduating.

In 1920s, Walt started working with his brother Roy creating animated cartoons that were later shown in local theaters. They created Laugh-O-Gram shorts but due to financial difficulties, it did not last long. In 1923, Walt along with his wife Lillian Moussette (whom he married in 1924) moved to Hollywood California hoping to make something big out of animation industry. There, they met Ub Iwerks who helped them create Mickey Mouse cartoon series.

By 1937, Walt’s company produced Snow White and The Seven Dwarfs – America's first full-length animated film. It became hugely popular among audiences and paved way for many other Disney movies like Cinderella, Peter Pan etc.

Apart from making animations, Walt also made live-action films including Song of the South and Old Yeller. Also during World War II, he used his studio to produce training videos for US Army Air Force pilots.

Disneyland opened its gates in July 1955 after taking six years to build. It proved to be immensely profitable venture for the company and inspired theme parks around the world such as Tokyo Disneyland, Hong Kong Disneyland, Eurodisney Paris and more recently Shanghai Disneyland.

Sadly, Walt passed away suddenly on December 15th, 1966 at age 65 from lung cancer. However, even today his legacy lives through his works which have entertained generations all over the globe.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.instructional technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.a

instruction: Can you help me figure out how to sew a button on a shirt?
output:
Sure, here are the steps for sewing a button onto a shirt:

1. First, make sure your new button is the right size and shape for the hole in your garment.

2. Next, thread your needle with strong, color-matching thread (usually cotton or polyester). If there's already an existing button on the shirt, try threading through it so that when you remove the old one, the knot will be hidden by the new one.
 
3. Then, fold the threads of the old button over once and push them down into the fabric slightly. This makes room for the new button and also helps secure the first stitch.

4. Position the new button directly above where the old one was located, making sure it’s aligned properly.

5. Take small stitches around the perimeter of the new button using even tension, going both horizontally and vertically. Make sure not to go too deep as this could damage the fabric underneath.

6. Once finished stitching, tie off any loose ends securely inside the shirt if possible, then trim away the excess thread. 

7. Finally, gently press the area around the newly attached button to flatten out any wrinkles or bumps caused during the process.

That should do it! You now have successfully sewn a button back onto your shirt.al video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HsVhUqzZd8instructional article:https://www.wikihow.com/Sew-a-Button-on-Clothingal image: https://i.pinimg.com/originals/37/cb/b9/37cbb93e67a75ea0cebcfddcfdf62ab.jpgal gif:https://media.giphy.com/media/TtNpLXvWlPmFy/giphy.gifal diagram: https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0005/3579/2760/articles/how-to-sew-button_1024x1024.png?1616257227al text book page: https://books.google.co.in/books?id=wJgCAAAAMBAJ&pg=PA46&dq=sow+button+on+a+shirt&hl=en&sa=X&ved=0ahUKBJdoKuMj9rbaAhkDLDYKHzGCBYQKgQIaAYoMAA#v=onepage&q=sow%20button%20on%20a%20shirt&f=falseal infographic: https://image

instruction: How did serial killers get away with murder for so long in the 70s and 80s?
output:
Serial killings were not as widely reported or investigated during the '70s and '80s, which allowed many of these criminals to operate undetected. Additionally, forensic science was still developing at this time, making it easier for some murderers to evade detection through lack of evidence left behind.

There are also theories that suggest a cultural shift towards individualism, social isolation and economic instability may have contributed to an increase in crime rates overall, including those committed by serial offenders. Many experts believe that societal factors such as poverty, racism, discrimination, and mental illness can play roles in why people become serial killers, but there is no definitive answer on what caused their behavior in specific cases.al technology.al technology.al technology.instructional technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology.al technology

instruction: How do I make apple juice?
output:
To make fresh, homemade apple juice you will need the following ingredients:

- Apples (about 4 to 6 medium sized apples per cup of finished juice)
- Water 
- Sugar or honey for sweetening if desired

Instructions:
1. Start by washing your hands and then gathering all necessary materials.
2. Rinse the apples thoroughly under running water before peeling them with a vegetable peeler or paring knife.
3. Core the apples using an apple corer or remove their cores manually by cutting out the center stem section.
4. Cut each cored apple into quarters and place them in a large pot.
5. Add enough cold water to cover the cut up apples completely.
6. Place the pot over high heat on stove top burner until it reaches boiling point.
7. Reduce the heat to simmer gently while stirring occasionally so that none of the fruit sticks to bottom of pan during cooking process.
8. Cook for about half hour or till the apples have softened significantly.
9. Remove from heat and let cool slightly before pouring through fine mesh strainer set over bowl to collect liquid portion only leaving solids behind.
10. If needed, press cooked pulp against sieve with back of spoon or spatula to extract as much juice as possible.
11. Discard any remaining solid bits left after pressing through strainer.

Optional: You may add sugar or honey according to taste at this stage before bottling your freshly made apple juice. end here.

Enjoy your delicious home-made Apple Juice! end here. end here. end here. end here.instruction end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. end here. en

instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Israeli dishes. Can you give me a recipe Israeli Cheese Bourekas?
output:
Sure! One popular dish among Israelis is cheese boureka - it's deliciously flaky pastry filled with creamy feta or any other type of cheese that melts beautifully when baked.

Ingredients:
- 1 sheet frozen puff pastry (thawed)
- Salt 
- Pepper
- 2 oz crumbled feta

Instructions: 

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F.
2. Unfold thawed puff pastry on a lightly-floured surface. Cut into quarters lengthwise and then cut each quarter crosswise into thirds so you have nine squares total.
3. Place one tablespoon of crumbled feta onto half of each square.
4. Brush egg wash around filling edges.
5. Fold dough over filling to enclose; press down edges firmly to seal. 
6. Use your fingers to gently flatten the top slightly.
7. Arrange bourekas about an inch apart on parchment-lined baking sheets.
8. Bake until puffed and golden brown, approximately 20 minutes.
9. Serve hot or warm as a snack or appetizer!

instruction: How can I make bubble solution?
output:
To make a simple DIY homemade bubble solution, you'll need just three ingredients: dish soap (such as Dawn), glycerin or corn syrup and water. Here's how to do it:

- Fill a measuring cup with about one-third of the volume with your choice of liquid detergent - we recommend using an unscented brand such as Joy.
- Add in two-thirds of distilled water into the same measuring cup until all is full up to its brim. 
- Stir well so that both liquids mix together properly.

Optional step:
If desired, add 1 tablespoon of glycerine for every half-cup of mixture. Glycerine helps bubbles last longer by keeping them from bursting prematurely. You could also use sugar instead if you don't have any glycerol on hand.

Pour some bubble solution into a shallow container like a bowl or tray before dipping a wand or toy into it. Now blow away! Enjoy watching big, round bubbles float through the air.al videos available online showing you exactly what to do. Remember to keep your bubble solution stored when not in use, and always shake it up again before making new bubbles. instruction: How to make frosting with crisco
output:
To make frosting using Crisco, you will need the following ingredients:

-1/2 cup Crisco (shortening)
-4 cups powdered sugar 
-3 tablespoons milk or cream 
-1 teaspoon vanilla extract 

Here's how to do it:
1. Begin by measuring out half a cup of Crisco and placing in a mixing bowl.
2. Next, add four cups of powdered sugar into the same mixing bowl.
3. Mix these two dry ingredients together until well combined.
4. Once mixed, slowly pour in three tablespoons of your choice of milk or heavy whipping cream while continuously stirring the mixture.
5. Add one teaspoon of pure vanilla extract for flavoring.
6. Keep on mixing all the ingredients until they become smooth and creamy.
7. You now have homemade frosting made from Crisco! Use as desired.

Enjoy!: To make frosting using Crisco, start by combining half a cup of shortening with four cups of powdered sugar in a large mixing bowl. Stir the two ingredients together until well combined before pouring in three tablespoons of milk or cream. Slowly mix everything together until the consistency is smooth and creamy, then stir in some vanilla extract for extra flavor. instruction: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Tunisian dishes. Can you give me a recipe Tunisian Kammounia?
output:
Kamouniat is one delicious dish that originates from the city of Sfax, Tunisia. It's made with cauliflower florets, fried until crispy then topped off with a spiced tomato sauce. Here’s how to make it:

Ingredients:
- Cauliflower: One large head or about two pounds.
- Olive oil for frying 
- Garlic cloves (4)
- Tomatoes (3), diced
- Chili peppers (2), finely chopped
- Cumin seeds(1 teaspoon)  
- Coriander powder(½ teaspoon) 
- Salt as per taste

Instructions:
1. Start by washing your cauliflower thoroughly under running water and pat dry using paper towels.
2. Cut the stem end off of the cauliflower so that all the individual floret pieces are separated.
3. Heat up enough olive oil to cover the bottom of a deep fryer pan over medium heat.
4. Once hot, carefully add each piece of cauliflower into the oil making sure not to overcrowd the pan. Fry them till they turn golden brown on both sides. Set aside once done.
5. In another pot, sauté garlic and chili pepper until fragrant. Add tomatoes, cumin seed, coriander powder and salt to this mixture. Cook for around ten minutes before turning off the flame.
6. Place fried cauliflower pieces onto serving plates. Pour cooked tomato sauce generously atop them. Serve warm.

instruction: I want to learn more about airplanes. How were they created?
output:
Airplanes have a long history that dates back over one hundred years ago, with the first successful powered flight taking place in December of 1903 by two brothers named Wilbur and Orville Wright.

The development of air travel can be traced all the way back to ancient times when people used kites for recreation or transportation purposes. As technology advanced, so did our understanding of aerodynamics, which allowed us to create heavier-than-air flying machines like gliders, balloons, and then finally fixed-wing aircrafts.

In the early days of aviation, most inventors focused on designing engines capable of powering their creations. The next step was building an airplane's structure strong enough to support its weight while also being lightweight enough not to slow down too much during takeoff. Once this challenge had been overcome, engineers turned towards improving stability, control systems, fuel efficiency, and safety measures.

Throughout the twentieth century, many innovations took place within the field of aerospace engineering - from metal alloys replacing wood as primary materials, to jet propulsion replacing piston engines, to the invention of radar and autopilot technologies, among others. Today, we see new types of planes emerging such as supersonic jets, drones, and electric-powered vehicles that are set to revolutionize commercial flights even further.

Overall, it is fascinating how far humans have come since the dawn of aerial exploration!al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.instructional text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al text explaining the evolution of airplanes from their origins up until today.al tex

instruction: Can you tell me a very easy to way clean a showerhead?
output:
Yes, of course! Here's an easy step-by-step method for cleaning your shower head:

1. Fill a plastic bag with vinegar and attach it around the base of the shower head.
2. Let the shower run through the night or at least several hours so that the vinegar can loosen any mineral deposits on the showerhead.

3. If there are still stubborn spots after soaking in vinegar, use an old toothbrush or soft bristled brush to scrub away the residue.
4. Rinse off all remaining vinegar and dry the shower head completely before reattaching it back onto its place.
